attributes.action: Make publishing false news a criminal act.
attributes.additional_details: The following is a list of active fake news websites, it's easy to understand that people can be mislead to believing the false news published, therefore having mislead opnions and unfair judgements of political figures, celebrities, major word events and more. Some of the following are imitating real news websites which makes it easier for people to fall for the false stories. http://empirenews.net/ http://dailycurrant.com/ http://abcnews.com.co/ http://empirenews.net/ http://newyorker.com/
attributes.background: The internet is a vast network of news and information which should be trusted yet millions of people are being deliberately misguided into believing false information which causes unfair and sometimes dangerous judgements and opinions. True news should be of utmost importance in our society.
